edgerouter.desc: When drop-in gateway is working, all traffic from clients in the network is first processed by this router. For details, please view $$$$ Drop-in Gateway Topology $$$$. You can use this mode to extend the functionality of your primary route.
edgerouter.dhcp_closed_tips: The DHCP service on the main router is disabled, drop-in gateway is working.
edgerouter.dhcp_on_tips: The DHCP service is still enabled on the main router. Drop-in gateway may not work properly. Please $$$$go to the main router admin panel$$$$ to disable the DHCP service or set its gateway to {ip}.
edgerouter.enable_tips: When the drop-in gateway is working, the DNS of this router is used instead of the DNS of the main route.
edgerouter.dhcp_set_gateway_tips: The DHCP service on the main router has correctly set the gateway to {ip}, drop-in gateway is working.
edgerouter.auto_set_tips: 检测到你主路由已更换，请使用$$$$自动配置$$$$将你目前的配置更新，避免后续影响功能正常使用。
